title: Research and Compile a List of Eco-friendly Materials for Advanced Battery Production - RFC Draft
description: Gather information on environmentally friendly materials that can be used in the production of advanced batteries, focusing on their suitability for our specific project needs. Please include data on cost-effectiveness, availability, recyclability, energy density and potential challenges or limitations during integration into our existing manufacturing processes. Additionally, consider researching potential alternatives to current battery materials with lower environmental impact.

title: Develop a prototype design for the EcoFriendlyBatteries
description: Design the physical structure and internal components of the battery using eco-friendly materials.
dependencies: Research and compile a list of eco-friendly materials for battery production

title: Create 3D models for the prototype design
description: Convert the prototype design into 3D models to facilitate manufacturing.
dependencies: Develop a prototype design for the EcoFriendlyBatteries

title: Source eco-friendly materials for prototype production
description: Purchase or find providers of the eco-friendly materials needed for the battery prototype.
dependencies: Research and compile a list of eco-friendly materials for battery production

title: Manufacture the prototype EcoFriendlyBattery
description: Produce the first physical instance of the advanced, eco-friendly battery.
dependencies: Create 3D models for the prototype design
Source eco-friendly materials for prototype production

title: Perform initial testing on the EcoFriendlyBattery prototype
description: Assess the functionality, energy storage capacity, and other key performance indicators of the first physical instance of the advanced battery.

title: Document test results and provide feedback for design improvements
description: Write a report on the findings from the initial testing and suggest design modifications if necessary.
dependencies: Perform initial testing on the EcoFriendlyBattery prototype

title: Iterate and refine the design based on test results
description: Modify the design of the battery based on the findings from the initial testing.
dependencies: Document test results and provide feedback for design improvements
